description: AnnaBelle gets the opportunity to ride the wooden pony. Its a cruel mistress and even padded, its a small slice of hell. Claire adds to her predicament, tying the legs wide open and her arms behind her. Even if she tries to crunch her abs, there is no way to release the pressure of her weight on the wood mashed against her sensitive cunt. Some girls look like they need a pantyhose hood. AnnaBelle is one of them. Face wrapped and body prepped, she is ready for a cruel pony ride. Her only option out is suspension...
title: AnnaBelle Lee - Red Headed Slut - Live Show Part 3
